alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Southern Calcasieu; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:26PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cameron and south central Calcasieu Parishes through 815 PM CDT... At 726 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Heberts Marina, or near Grand Lake. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Grand Lake, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Hackberry, Carlyss, Heberts Marina and Sweet Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Southern Calcasieu; West Cameron
